sentences.english: The score had not been published and would have been seen only by a few musicians.
sentences.chinese: 配樂總譜還未出版，只有少數音樂家看到過。

sentences.english: This idea also applies to what we see on the score.
sentences.chinese: 這個觀點同樣可以運用到總譜上。

sentences.english: The cantata has a difficult vocal score.
sentences.chinese: 這個康塔塔有個難度很大的聲樂總譜。

sentences.english: The music of the song has been rearranged for the cantata.
sentences.chinese: 這個康塔塔有個難度很大的聲樂總譜。

definition: the Book of History, one of the Five Classics of Confucianism 五經|五经[Wu3 jing1], a compendium of documents which make up the oldest extant texts of Chinese history, from legendary times down to the time of Confucius, also known as 尚書經|尚书经[Shang4 shu1 jing1], 尚書|尚书[Shang4 shu1], 書|书[Shu1]
a book on the art of war
Ye county in Pingdingshan 平頂山|平顶山[Ping2 ding3 shan1], Henan
variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]
the hardships of beginning an undertaking (idiom)
the Hundred Schools of Thought, the various schools of thought and their exponents during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (770-220 BC)
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
